document.topic_text: Rinse and repeat Rules All link submissions must feature baby elephants. Acceptable formats include gif, gifv, mp4, and webm. Submissions must not contain sound. Please use a reliable host such as imgur or gfycat. Gifs hosted on other websites may be removed at the discretion of the moderators. All projects, fundraisers, events, promotions, etc. must receive moderator approval before being posted. Contact us here. Please try not to repost. Did you know? The two major species of elephants— African and Asian —are classified as Vulnerable (VU) and Endangered (EN) respectively by the IUCN . They face an ever-increasing threat from poaching and loss of habitat, and they need our help. Learn more about how you can help save elephants at:
